game.name: Seen

game.shortDescription: A lonely kid desperately tries to escape his dark world.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A lonely kid desperately tries to escape his dark world.

reviewHighlights.text: A great indie game. Simple gameplay, good atmosphere, and a great story + bonus quotes from famous figures in the world. Still waiting next chapter bt...
Nobody ever reads my reviews, but i just wanna give this a thumbs up.
